caption: Water and dreams...oh what a dream this bookstore cafe on a barge is! Make the short trek out there with a book and read away the day. The cheesecake is divine and everyone is so friendly!  Such a charming place and so very unusual and cool.  No tourists are at hand, making it peaceful and a little find.

This is the perfect place on Earth. If Id to die, Ill die there, sorrounded by books, plants, and a very great people. Nice staff, good food, best everything. Never mind if your french is not good. They are super kind.
Very nice ambiance with plants and books. I‚Äôd love to go there earlier one day so that I can get a spot and have some coffee. Very full on a Sunday and everyone seemed to be enjoying themselves

This place is perfect. It's cosy, warm and friendly. Great books, good beers, comfortable, and there's not even that many people during the week. I greatly recommend it for some quality alone time, for a date, or for a simple lunch...

AMAZING SPOT! Definitely must visit. All books in French. Very lovely cafe right on the canal. Wonderful staff. Generous pours of the wine. Just a lovely peaceful environment to chill out. Also they seem to have events and live music sometimes too.

Such a cute concept! I went during the daytime and it was very quiet and peaceful. Great place to study on the lower floor with the books, or meet up with friends on the patio! They have coffee, plants and books, what more could you need‚ù§Ô∏è
Great discovery at Paris 19. Very cosy and unusual spot to be lost in dreams.

This little boat is simply amazing. You can sit on its deck and drink some beers or go downstairs and browse through books. The also have a lot of books about gardening and plants, and even a nice collection of potted plants. Definitely recommend this spot as an alternative to the busy streets filled with tourists.
Loved the ambiente, plus friendly staff. Cappuccino ok, Chai good üëçüèº ‚Ä¶
Lovely and pretty cozy place, a great surprise.

Cute little caf√© on the boat. Stayed for just one drink so can't give much details, but while there they brought a water bowl for a dog without being asked for it which was a really lovely gesture  for the parched dog.
Really nice food, wine and coffee in a unique environment. Friendly staff.
Great atmosphere, friendly service, fantastic food. Can't do anything wrong here. Really nice sitting on the sun deck roof and having diner or a drink. The library with it's caf√© is nice as well.
Beautiful bookshop and coffee stop in a boat.
Really nice space, great selection of books and the drinks were fine. On the other hand, the service (the lady at the bar in particular) was extremly rude!!!
Wonderful place!!‚ô•Ô∏è Cozy, beautiful atmosphere, even in the winter!ü§© Great stuff, music, decoration and delicious food too! There is also a library inside. Totally worth it! ‚Ä¶
Cozy and welcome.atsmosphere. idyllic situation in canal de l'Ourcq. Great for am end of the evening drink outside.
A bit expensive, but we were there for the experience which made it ok. However one extremely unfriendly person ruined the whole experience. What a pity.
C'est super cool ! I can just picture myself on a Sunday, with a cup of tea and a good book!
It‚Äôs a bookstore cafe on the river - what a wonderful way to spend an afternoon. Had a light and creamy cheesecake and glasses of wine.
Nice space, the downstairs book shop is cute and cozy. The cocktails are very small given the price.
A wonderful place with good food and beer, and a great seleciotn seleciton of interesting books!
Handmade. Genuine. Beautiful on the water. Plus library. A great place
If you like books about nature and the environment, this is the place for you! Unique location, but hardly any contact with the employees
Great food great drink great staff ‚úåÔ∏èüòé ‚Ä¶
Super moment, brunch excellent !
Chill vibe..books, snacks and drinks, on a boat. üëå ‚Ä¶
Toptop
Tip top tchiki zbop
Wonderful
Cool spot.

I went there for a private party because the barge offers this option. The place is magnificent and offers a very beautiful panorama. The banquet offered a wide range of cold meats, cheese and raw vegetables. In addition there is a whole bookstore in the basement. To visit to combine meals and reading.
Very good concept. Friendly place in a cozy setting. Fresh dishes and friendly atmosphere.  Drawing exhibition to see. I highly recommend

A real little gem! The ‚ÄúCaf√© Librairie‚Äù is set on a barge, with a unique and adorable decor that mixes bohemian influences, with plants and books everywhere. The warm, family atmosphere makes you immediately feel at ease. Upstairs, there is a very cute dining area with a magnificent view of the canal, and a charming terrace. Downstairs, a real little library adds additional charm to this already magical place. The service is lovely and attentive. You can easily spend the whole afternoon there working, studying or simply enjoying a good coffee. I haven't had the chance to try their food yet, but their wraps and burgers look delicious and everything is very affordable, making it a perfect place for students.  I highly recommend!

A brunch on the water at the weekend, and a fish restaurant during the week, only at lunchtime. You can also privatize this barge for your evenings. A barge with a sheltered roof terrace, ideal for having a drink with friends, whatever the weather. And in the body of the barge, an atmosphere of a large living room full of books and plants, with decoration and a warm atmosphere. Thank you for your welcome

My partner introduced me to this very charming place, tastefully decorated. It's very pleasant to have a cold or hot drink there while comfortably seated. There is also a bookstore which offers a good choice of books, including a certain number geared towards ecology, nature, etc. It's a place that I recommend.

I am so won over! I knew the name but never took the time to come‚Ä¶ what a mistake‚Ä¶  The bookstore side is ultimately smaller than I thought, we quickly get around it and I was hoping for other books than on botany but after all it's the concept so it's normal!  The caf√© side is adorable, cozy, the decor is full of soul and history, everything I love! The service is also great, the waiter took wonderful care of me. A delicious and light cheesecake, a jazz atmosphere for breakfast/coworking, I didn't want to leave!  As a student, the prices of the meals are not necessarily the most affordable but after all: you only have one life! So I decided to stay for lunch and that wasn‚Äôt a mistake! The dish was extraordinarily good: salmon and butternut pistachio velout√©, everything I love‚Ä¶ but better (kudos to the chef in the kitchen) I was treated to a starter to compensate for a salmon fillet that was too small. And as I still didn't want to leave this place where you feel so good, I had a genmeisha tea while reading a book for another good hour  Looking forward to coming back, why not try the brunch :)

Really nice place, pleasant, at the water's edge, nice decor with lots of plants going down in the barge. Great selection of books on plants and ecology. Very good brunch! We were served quickly, the tip was the self-service start (hot drinks, French toast with jams) to wait for the savory dish served on a plate, which was very fresh, very appreciated with the heat of June. Top dessert, cheesecake! 24‚Ç¨/person, normal price I think. Friendly staff. I recommend.
